---
title: 'catalog add'
description: "Add a build to the compute catalog"
---

Add a build directory to the catalog so you can reference it by alias or entry ID from other commands (e.g. `xorq run`, `xorq lineage`).

## Usage

Pass a build directory path and optionally an alias.

```bash
xorq catalog add <build_path> [OPTIONS]
```

## Arguments

The build to add to the catalog.

| Argument | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `build_path` | Path to the build directory to add |

## Options

Optional alias for the entry.

| Option | Short | Default | Description |
|--------|-------|---------|-------------|
| `--alias` | `-a` | | Optional alias for this entry |

## Example

Add a build with an alias so you can reference it by name.

```bash
xorq catalog add builds/f02d28198715 --alias penguins-v1
```
